review: My son was admitted to PICU with breathing problem and was on ventilator Dr.Raghu took care of my baby very well and we are in continuous followup with him and my son is only comfortable with our doctor . I have refered my friends to him .He is very patient and responds well to all our queries

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Paediatric Emergency  Care,stomach and intestinal infections,
review:
Dr.raghunath c n is an excellent ,very simple and friendly with his patients.we  consulted him two years back .my kid had been hospitalised in reputed hospitals of up for suspected gbs, adem but no proper diagnosis was done .we flew to Bangalore and dr raghunath really did miracle ...my son recovered so fastly  under dr.raghunath's treatment .we are really very greatful for his moral support at the time of crisis.the doctor is much concerned towards his patients . I recommend him thousand times..his commitment, concern ,professional ethics are undoubtedly great.
   Today again we rushed to him as my kid has been diagnosed with kidney stone, and  suspected appendicitis at another multi specialty hospital ..tensed with their procedure, predictions we again came to  dr raghunath c n and his most assuring words eased us ..he recommends no unnecessary diagnostic tests .

My daughter was having respiratory issues and wheezing symptoms.Her treatment was taken care of by the same doctor.She has improved a lot by his medication.
And now we came here for a regular checkup.Doctor is friendly and polite as always.and has shown enough Patience to listen to our problems.Also he has given advice on her diet.

I will definetely suggest Dr.Ragunath for pediatric treatment to my friend and collegues.

Thanks,
Sanal

Dr.Raghu has taken care of my child since birth and my daughter was preterm and has helped to take care of my baby in a right way.He explained to me about the side effects of vaccine ,he is very friendly and would recommend to my friends and relatives

I admitted my baby at sugar hospital as it is my panel hospital. Dr. Raghunath is in charge of PICU . He came for preliminary checking and after checking...he said baby is in stable condition. And asked me , I am from which place. I said AP. I asked, sir do you Telugu...his reply is even if I know Telugu why should he has to speak Telugu...the first bad impression I got on him. The very next day, platelets count reduced....and he said at very jovial way...as he is not at all concerned about my baby. After series of incidents my baby was expired and he didn't come at all on that day at least to  console us. He never explained exactly the reason for my baby death. I never recommend dr.raghunath and sugar hospital instead go for cloud nine or Marathi manual.
Amazing doctor he is a dr who does not give up till d end. Thank u dr fr d best u tried we all really appreciate it.

review: My daughter (Shaguftaa imraan)was in critical condition when we brought her to sagar hospital.. her heart rate was too high and luckily she was treated by Dr Raghunath sir.. she got the utmost care which she needed in her critical times and we are very happy with the treatment she got and also the Dr is very friendly and listens peacefully.. we highly recommended Dr. Raghunath to our friends and family members
